column2: I was both excited and saddened to hear Tyson Cole's Uchi was expanding to Houston. On the one hand
column3: it's UCHI: not only a premier Japanese gastronomic experience
column4: but also a top-notch service atmosphere. And now
column6: it's just 20 minutes instead of 2.5 hours away. On the other hand
column7: eating at Uchi Austin just felt...special. It was something to look forward to
column9: to want longingly. It was a mecca. Now
